sentences.en: After staying a few days in Shanghai, he moved on to Singapore.
sentences.cn: 在上海逗留了几天之后，他又启程去新加坡。

sentences.en: Against my premonitions, I was duty - bound to reassure my old friend from Singapore.
sentences.cn: 尽管我有不祥的预感, 但我有义务安抚我的新加坡老朋友.
但是在新加坡就不同了。

sentences.en: He simply skated over the difficulties there would be if we moved to Singapore.
sentences.cn: 他只是轻描淡写地讲了一下如果我们移居新加坡可能会遇到的困难.

sentences.en: He visited Thailand and Singapore to tout for investment.
sentences.cn: 他访问了泰国与新加坡，以期招揽投资。

sentences.en: In Singapore we were ordered to surrender by command headquarters.
sentences.cn: 在新加坡,是指挥部命令我们投降的.

sentences.en: It was January 19, a year to the day since he had arrived in Singapore.
sentences.cn: 那天是1月19号，他到新加坡正好一年的日子。

sentences.en: Just before I left Singapore, I sent them a telegram.
sentences.cn: 在离开新加坡前我给他们发了一封电报.

sentences.en: Pakistan's Jansher Khan has won the men's final at the Singapore Open.
sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦的詹谢尔汗取得了新加坡公开赛男子决赛的胜利。

sentences.en: Punctually at 7.45, the express to Kuala Lumpur left Singapore station.
sentences.cn: 7点45分，开往吉隆坡的特快列车准时驶离新加坡火车站。

sentences.en: Singapore Airlines is rumoured to be bidding for a management contract to run both airports.
sentences.cn: 据传，新加坡航空公司正在争取签下两家机场的经营权。

sentences.en: Singapore and South Africa have established diplomatic relations.
sentences.cn: 新加坡和南非已经建立了外交关系。

sentences.en: Singapore companies should seize these opportunities to carve out a niche for ourselves.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的公司也应抓紧这些机会来为自己争取一席之地.

sentences.en: The cargo was due to be offloaded in Singapore three days later.
sentences.cn: 货物定于3天后在新加坡卸载。

sentences.en: These new neighbours, to whom I was introduced yesterday, have come here from Singapore.
sentences.cn: 这些新邻居是从新加坡来的,昨天我被介绍同他们认识了.
